casebody.data:
RODNEY KYLES v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 23539)

Foti, Bishop and McLachlan, Js.

Submitted on briefs October 30 officially released December 2, 2003 Per Curiam.

The habeas court did not abuse its discretion in denying the petitioner certification to appeal from the dismissal of his petition for a writ of habeas corpus.

The appeal is dismissed.
